options.content:
- Kurzer News-Artikel, mit Audio/Video ohne Sendebezug
- Kurzer News-Artikel, mit Sendebezug und Audio/Video
- Langer Newsartikel mit Sendebezug und Audio/Video
- Langer Newsartikel mit aktuellen Video/Audio
- Langer Nachrichtenartikel mit Sendebezug und ausgelaufen Videos/Audio
- Artikel ohne Sendebezug mit aktuellen Audios/Video
- Artikel ohne Sendebezug mit Animation, Datenvisualisierung

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
- Kurzer News-Artikel ohne Sendebezug, ohne Audios/Video
- Kurzer News-Artikel mit Sendebezug, ohne Audio und Video
- Langer Newsartikel ohne Sendebezug
- Langer Newsartikel nur mit Sendebezug
- Langer Newsartikel mit älteren Video/Audio nur

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
- Andere Kombinationen Typ A
- Andere Kombinationen Typ B

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

options.content: Die Daten werden stündlich zwischen 06:00 Uhr und 21:00 Uhr aktualisiert.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH max_timestamp AS (
  SELECT MAX(last_update) AS latest_timestamp
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
  WHERE date = ${bq_date:doublequote}
)

SELECT structureNodePath, A, B, C
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
WHERE last_update = (SELECT latest_timestamp FROM max_timestamp)
AND structureNodePath != "main_${Redaktion:raw}"

SELECT
  FORMAT_DATE('%Y/%m', PARSE_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', date)) AS YearMonth, -- Combines year and month into a single string 'YYYY-MM'
  SUM(A) AS A,
  SUM(B) AS B,
  SUM(C) AS C
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}_daily`
WHERE
  date >= ${bq_six_months:doublequote}
  AND structureNodePath = "main_${Redaktion:raw}"
GROUP BY
  YearMonth
ORDER BY
  YearMonth;

WITH max_timestamp AS (
  SELECT MAX(last_update) AS latest_timestamp
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
  WHERE date = ${bq_date:doublequote}
)

SELECT 
       article.item.classificationDescription AS Klassifikationsbeschreibung,
       article.item.sophoraId AS SophoraID,
       structureNodePath AS Unterknoten,
       article.item.url AS URL
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`,
      UNNEST(articlesC.list) as article
WHERE last_update = (SELECT latest_timestamp FROM max_timestamp)
  AND structureNodePath != "main_${Redaktion:raw}";

WITH max_timestamp AS (
  SELECT MAX(last_update) AS latest_timestamp
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
  WHERE date = ${bq_date:doublequote}
)

SELECT 
       article.item.classificationDescription AS Klassifikationsbeschreibung,
       article.item.sophoraId AS SophoraID,
       structureNodePath AS Unterknoten,
       article.item.url as URL,

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`,
      UNNEST(articlesB.list) as article
WHERE last_update = (SELECT latest_timestamp FROM max_timestamp)
  AND structureNodePath != "main_${Redaktion:raw}";

WITH max_timestamp AS (
  SELECT MAX(last_update) AS latest_timestamp
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
  WHERE date = ${bq_date:doublequote}
)

SELECT 
       article.item.classificationDescription AS Klassifikationsbeschreibung,
       article.item.sophoraId AS SophoraID,
       structureNodePath as Unterknoten,
       article.item.url AS URL
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`,
      UNNEST(articlesA.list) as article
WHERE last_update = (SELECT latest_timestamp FROM max_timestamp)
  AND structureNodePath != "main_${Redaktion:raw}";

current.value: CAST(date AS DATE) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: CAST(date AS DATE) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
CAST(date AS DATE) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  2 DAY)

list.query: Heute : CAST(date AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : CAST(date AS DATE) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Vorgestern : CAST(date AS DATE) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  2 DAY)

list.name: Redaktion
list.query: TDI : Nachrichten, Sport, Wissen, Kultur, Medienkompetenz

query.rawSql:
SELECT column_name
FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE table_name = ${Redaktion:doublequote}
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2

SELECT column_name
FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE table_name = ${Redaktion:doublequote}
LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3

SELECT DISTINCT structureNodePath
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.MDR.gcs_telemedienampel_${Redaktion:raw}`
LIMIT 100 OFFSET 1
SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)) from `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Vorgestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 2 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`
